name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients, season with salt and lemon, serve cold.

name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Marinate paneer and vegetables, grill or pan fry until golden.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Stir fry egg, add rice and soy sauce, toss well.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado, spread and season.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Simmer all ingredients until lentils are soft.

name: Vegetable Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta, saut√© vegetables, mix together.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry chicken and vegetables, add sauce, cook until done.

name: Tofu Buddha Bowl
instructions: Bake tofu, assemble bowl with rice and veggies, drizzle sauce.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, honey, and nuts in a glass.

name: Veggie Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs, cook with vegetables, fold with cheese.
